briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Challenge Study of Live Oral Cholera Vaccine Candidate,PXVX0200, to Prevent Cholera
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Efficacy Trial of a Single Dose Live Oral Cholera Vaccine, PXVX0200 CVD 103-HgR, in Preventing Cholera Following Challenge With Vibrio Cholerae 10 Days or 3 Months After Vaccination
summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if PXVX0200 is safe and effective in preventing cholera infection

primaryOutcome.measure: % of Participants With Moderate to Severe Diarrhea
